snippet: SIROTA--David King, passed away peacefully at home on April 11 surrounded by family and friends. He was a beloved husband, father, brother, uncle and esteemed physician. On the medical staff of Mt. Sinai Medical Center for almost 50 years, he held a Clinical Associate Professorship in Medicine and Endocrinology and was a Fellow of the American College of Physicians and the American College of Endocrinology. A graduate of Harvard '56 and Washington University Medical School '60, he also served in the US army as commander of a MASH hospital in Korea. His memory will be cherished by the myriad patients for whom he provided expert and compassionate care. He is survived by his loving wife Theodora, children Miriam and Eliot, sister Linda Brown and nieces Allison Kotin and Jennifer Simon. Services will be held at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ, Thursday at 11am. 1/3
